other_title: El mundo de Rumiko: Maris, la chica maravillosa (Spanish)
plot: As a Thanatos-born alien, Maris is extremely strong. Normally she wears restraints to limit her. Yet she is still able to damage her surroundings. And with the repair bills piling up from her vacation and from her job at the Space Patrol, she must try to find some way to pay for all the damages. The opportunity arises when a billionaire's son is kidnapped and Maris pins her hopes on wooing him during the rescue.
insert_song: "Buin Buin Buin" (ブイン ブイン ブイン) by Kilala to Ulala
"Midori no Lullabye" (緑のララバイ) by Yoshiko Yamagiwa with Tops
